keys.string: Arun is supposed to have his office hours today. The door is closed, so I knock.
The door opens to reveal his office. It’s a small little space. Arun hasn’t done much to the space so it looks just like every other teacher’s office. Could use a little more decoration.
Came to ask about the class?
Well yes. More specifically the first assignment.
No, I just want to make sure I did it correctly.

Oh, well I’d be happy to take a look. Usually I don’t get students coming in this early so I was a little confused. Most of my visitors are worried about failing their classes. It’s nice to have a change.
I hand Arun my homework. He pulls out his answer key to make sure I have them right.
These look good, so don’t worry. I’m glad that you got the hang of it pretty quick. Hopefully this means I won’t see you later. You know, failing and all. Have a good day.
Thanks Arun! I think I’ll be just fine.
I leave his office and close the door.

[Narrator][Dialog]The door opens to reveal his office. It’s a small little space. Arun hasn’t done much to the space so it looks just like every other teacher’s office. Could use a little more decoration.
[Player][Dialog]Well yes. More specifically the first assignment.
[Player][Dialog]No, I just want to make sure I did it correctly.

[Arun][Dialog]Oh, well I’d be happy to take a look. Usually I don’t get students coming in this early so I was a little confused. Most of my visitors are worried about failing their classes. It’s nice to have a change.
[Narrator][Dialog]I hand Arun my homework. He pulls out his answer key to make sure I have them right.
[Arun][Dialog]These look good, so don’t worry. I’m glad that you got the hang of it pretty quick. Hopefully this means I won’t see you later. You know, failing and all. Have a good day.
[Player][Dialog]Thanks Arun! I think I’ll be just fine.
[Narrator][Dialog]I leave his office and close the door.
